metadata.name: HackTool - SharpLDAPmonitor Execution
metadata.comment: Detects execution of the SharpLDAPmonitor. Which can monitor the creation, deletion and changes to LDAP objects.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND (endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\sharpldapmonitor.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('sharpldapmonitor.exe') OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/user:')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/pass:')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/dcip:'))))

output.summary: Detects execution of the SharpLDAPmonitor. Which can monitor the creation, deletion and changes to LDAP objects.
